metadata.title: CVE-2019-11724 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Application permissions give additional remote troubleshooting permissionto the site input.mozilla.org, which has been retired and now redirects toanother site. This additional permission is unnecessary and is a potentialvector for malicious attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 68.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
